options.option-description:
By default there is no background image. To add a background image, attach the image using an inline style. For example: <div class="tile-grid" style="background-image: url(path/to/image.jpg)">.

The image will be be set to cover the background, so select a large image. The example image is 2100 x 1400.
options.heading: What's happening in St Andrews

tile-1.title: MUSA is going greener
tile-1.description: The Museum of the University of St Andrews (MUSA) has attained the top standard for sustainability from the Green Tourism Business Scheme.

tile-2.title: A Rae of artistic sunshine
tile-2.description: The work of one of Scotland's most revered contemporary artists, Barbara Rae, is to go on display in St Andrews.

tile-3.title: World Cup fever at Sandy's Bar
tile-3.description: Hundreds of football fans watched the World Cup final in the newly opened Sandy's Bar at the Students' Association on Sunday.

tile-4.title: All in hand
tile-4.description: Scientists have, for the first time, decoded the meanings of chimpanzee gestures.

tile-5.title: Dogrees all round!
tile-5.description: Graduation is a time for all the family but this year one pet dog made its way into the post-ceremony celebrations in the Quad.

tile-6.title: Darling: "We belong together"
tile-6.description: Alistair Darling to use public address to make the case for Scotland remaining in the UK

options.option-description: The tile grid may be used without a background image, in which case it shows a default, solid background.
